activities: ChallengePost may receive various types of data from the EU or Switzerland both online and offline. We receive and process personal data from registered users on ChallengePost.com and our affiliated websites. Individuals and organizations may also provide additional data in order to participate in challenges, events, and other opportunities on websites that we operate. ChallengePost may also receive data from organizations and their employees in connection with sales inquiries, contracting, billing, or procuring goods and services, or from individuals who are employees or prospective employees. Data is transferred to the U.S. and held and processed for purposes including: marketing challenges, events and other opportunities on our websites; sales and marketing to organizations; contracting and transactions with organizations; providing services to organizations; customer support and relationship management; payment of prizes to challenge winners; other financial and tax activities; and human resources purposes.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: Data collected online and offline from registered website users, including clients and organizations. Data may be processed manually.
